content: तपनीय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be heated. {@--2@} To be suffered or practised (as a penance). --यं Gold; especially gold purified with fire; तपनीयाशोकः <ls>M. 3</ls>; तपनीयोपानद्युगलमार्यः प्रसादीकरोतु <ls>Mv. 4</ls>; असंस्पृशंतौ तपनीयपीठं <ls>R. 18. 41.</ls> (Also तपनीयकं in this sense.)
